titleStmt.title: Romulus and Tarquin. First written in Italian by the Marques Virgilio Malvezzi: and now taught English, by HCL.
Romulo. English
titleStmt.author: Malvezzi, Virgilio, marchese, 1595-1653.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.
Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. H[aviland] for Iohn Benson, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: HCL = Henry Carey, Earl of Monmouth.
The "HCL" on the title page is a xylographic monogram.
With an additional title page, engraved, and signed: Will: Marshall. sculpsit.
Reproduction of the original in the Newberry Library.
